page.title: 18WELFORD ORCHARD NURSERIES
page.content: grows it's leaf & stem in the light days of the year, & only forms it'S bud & flower as the days begin to get shorter & darker. Therefore 2 of the controls we use to flower crops A,Y,R, are light & darkness.the light being ordinary electric light bulbs which are switched on to give a long summer day & make the plants think it's spring & summer so the plants would grow leaf & stem only,& would not flower. The second control is darkness and the way we make it dark is by drawing across a curtain & switching off the lights,which would then make the plants think it was a short winter day and it would start to form a bud & eventually a flower. you can see from this that you cangrow a flower that can be cut any day or date of a 365 day year by the use of light which will give the length of stem desired
